findings.title: Revisited Price Calculation in AlphaKeysToken
findings.description: The trade price calculation should be improved in the getPriceV2() function to compute sum1 as 0 when supply<= NUMBER_UNIT_PER_ETHER and make the same adjustment for sum2.

findings.title: Incorrect Order Locking Validation in AlphaKeysFactory
findings.description: In the threeThreeTrade() function of AlphaKeysFactory contract, validating with requirement (!order.locked) should be revised as (order.locked)

findings.title: Revisited TokenA Buy Price in threeThreeTradeBTC()
findings.description: The `threeThreeTradeBTC()` function in `AlphaKeysFactory` uses a wrong price, charging more than intended for the buying user.

findings.title: Improved Parameter Validations in AlphaKeysFactory
findings.description: DeFi protocols typically have a number of system- wide parameters that can be dynamically configured on demand. The `AlphaKeysFactory` contract has defined a number of protocol-wide risk parameters, such as `_protocolFeeRatio` and `_playerFeeRatio`. In the following, we show the corresponding routines that allow for their changes.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In NBC, there is a privileged administrative account, i.e., owner. The administrative account plays a critical role in governing and regulating the protocol-wide operations.
